description: Makes this fighter a pulverizer, giving it +$5% attack speed and Pulverize.|n|n|c(ff8800):Pulverize:|r Each attack has a $1% ($2% for ranged) chance to stun its target for $3 seconds ($4 to bosses). Does not work on summons or clones.
name: Pulverizer
tooltip: Makes this fighter a pulverizer, giving it +4% attack speed and Pulverize.<br><br><span style='color: #ff8800'>Pulverize:</span> Each attack has a 34% (17% for ranged) chance to stun its target for 2 seconds (0.3 to bosses). Does not work on summons or clones.
